mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.projectSummaryId, if((t2.name is null or t2.name = ''), t1.fileTreeName, t2.name) as fileTreeName, t1.fileTreeId from projectSummaryFileTree t1 left join fileTree t2 on t1.fileTreeId = t2.id where projectSummaryId = #{projectSummaryId} order by id asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projectSummaryFileTree(projectSummaryId, fileTreeName, fileTreeId, deltag) VALUES (#{projectSummaryId}, #{fileTreeName}, #{fileTreeId}, #{deltag})
